300D Glo Ve 840B vectors ( Pennington et.from sentence: We utilize the 300D Glo Ve 840B vectors ( Pennington et al. , 2014 ) as our pre-trained word embeddings .

Adadelta ( Zeiler , 2012 ).from sentence: We use Adadelta ( Zeiler , 2012 ) to optimize all the trainable parameters .

Adadelta.from sentence: The hyperparameter of Adadelta is set as Zeiler ( 2012 ) suggest that is 1 e ? 6 and ? is 0.95 .

gradient explosion problem.from sentence: To avoid the gradient explosion problem , we apply gradient norm clipping .

batch size.from sentence: The batch size is set to 128 and all the dimensions of input vectors and hidden shows that our proposed model significantly outperforms all the other models in 7 datasets .
